# error

**Instance Property**

The error that prevented the content from being downloaded.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is valid only when the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload/downloadState] property is set to [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownloadState/failed].

## Accessing a Completed Download

- **contentURL**: The local location of the downloaded file.

items.description: The local location of the downloaded file.
